subject: Fwd: Thank you, we will help you fight out the cash crunch
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$485,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this easy form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
